titles.title: Economic Recovery for Small Businesses Act

To authorize the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to make direct loans to small business concerns that suffered substantial economic injury as a result of the terrorist attacks against the United States that occurred on September 11, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 10/11/2001--Introduced. Economic Recovery for Small Businesses Act - Authorizes the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to make direct loans to any small business concern that suffered substantial economic injury as a result of the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.
